definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

a fire in the city gates is also a calamity for the fish in the moat (idiom); the bystander will also suffer/fig. you can't escape responsibility for your actions/ask not for whom the bell tolls - it tolls for thee
pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

sentences.english: Which is the house that caught fire last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚失火的是那座房子？

sentences.english: On the day succeeding the fire, I visited the ruins.
sentences.chinese: 失火的第二天，我去查看那堆废墟。

sentences.english: Legend has it that once Lü's home caught fire.
sentences.chinese: 传说吕洞宾家有一次失火。

sentences.english: On their way home, they saw a house afire .
sentences.chinese: 在回家的路上，他们看到一座失火的房子。

sentences.english: Cohen is an expert on how houses catch fire.
sentences.chinese: 科恩对房子失火的原因很有研究。

sentences.english: He screamed (out) that there was a fire.
sentences.chinese: 他们谁也不懂得失火时要关上门。

sentences.english: They saw a house afire while on their way home.
sentences.chinese: 在回家的路上，他们见到一所失火的房子。

sentences.english: There was a stampede of panic - stricken crowd from the burning hotel.
sentences.chinese: 一群惊惶失措的人们，从失火的旅馆中跑了出来。

sentences.english: One of the most critical resources during an aircraft fire response is fire suppressants.
sentences.chinese: 在飞机失火救援中最重要的就是救火的灭火剂。

sentences.english: A fire on the city gate brings disaster to the fish in the moat.
Women suffer significantly more fire-related injuries and deaths than men.
sentences.chinese: 妇女因失火而受伤和死亡的情况远超过男性。

sentences.english: On the night of the day, I was aroused from sleep by the cry of fire.
sentences.chinese: 当天夜里，我在梦中被失火引发的叫喊声惊醒。

sentences.english: On real guns, some firing pins may be magnetized by strong magnets, causing misfire.
sentences.chinese: 在真枪，一些撞针可通过强大的磁场磁化，导致失火。

sentences.english: Preliminary investigation indicated the fire was caused by firecrackers or Kongming Lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 初步分析认定失火系燃放烟花爆竹或放孔明灯所致。

sentences.english: I want to report a fire on 12 Elm Road.
sentences.chinese: 我想要报火警，榆树路12号失火了。

sentences.english: They ran in the direction of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他们朝著失火的方向跑去。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
to set on fire/to commit arson
